Recommendations: More students may be encouraged to participate in relevant BSCM-related extension projects that showcase their maximum potential in Cooperative Management and community-based cooperative projects.
Establish re-planning activities based on feedbacks from major stakeholders/clienteles that include intervention/support strategies to sustain the impact of the project.
It is suggested that there should be a proper documentation and packaging of projects, specifically for the program under survey in relation to monitoring and evaluation.
Faculty and students are encouraged to conduct program-specific extension projects.
It is suggested that students be allowed to use their acquired skills by conducting community-based cooperative activities more often.
The College or the BSCM program is encouraged to source out funds from external partners/linkages for relevant extension programs.
